name: TinyGuts
description:
This is a game I spent about 6 months working on and off with called TinyGuts. It's a top-down twin stick shooter with 4 playable characters. It is likely buggy, but it should work for the most part.

it was originally going to be a bit bigger in scope, having abilities and more enemies,  but I've since moved on from it and don't have the same enthusiasm for it that I used to.

That being said, it's still the first game I've ever technically completed in the sense that it works more or less the basic way I want it to, so I wanted to upload it here to play for anyone who'd like to.  It's a pretty big milestone for me as a hobbyist/junior game developer.

Thanks for playing, if you do.
